title: Effect of interest rate change on amount of money

content.question: The amount of money that the public wants to hold in the form of cash will

choices.label: be unaffected by any change in interest rates or the price level
increase if the price level decreases
decrease if the price level remains constant

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
